document.full_text: richard childress was fined $150,000 on monday for assaulting kyle busch, the latest incident in an ongoing feud between nascar's most polarizing driver and childress' race teams.
document.title: childress fined $150,000 for busch altercation
lines_and_colors: richard childress was fined $150,000 on monday for assaulting kyle busch, the latest incident in an ongoing feud between nascar's most polarizing driver and childress' race teams.
